snippet: Officials announced the indictments of 49 members of two rival Brooklyn gangs, called the Rockstarz and the Very Crispy Gangsters.
abstract: New York City Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly and Brooklyn District Attorney Charles J Hynes announce the indictments of 49 members of two rival gangs in the East New York section of Brooklyn; gangs, Rockstarz and the Very Crispy Gangsters, both used Facebook to stoke violence, taunt one another and boast of murders and other crimes, giving investigators a virtual map of their gang-related activities; charges include murder, attempted murder and conspiracy.
lead_paragraph: Officials announced the indictments of 49 members of two rival Brooklyn gangs, called the Rockstarz and the Very Crispy Gangsters.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Gangs Boasted of Murders on Facebook, Police Say
headline.main: Facebook Friends Boasted of Gang War, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Facebook Friends Boasted Of Gang War, Police Say
